alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 2:57AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Slippery Conditions Early this Morning... .Many roads across the region are snow-covered or slippery as a result of a wintry mix that fell overnight. Freezing drizzle should continue on the heels of the snow and gradually transition to drizzle and end from west to east through the rest of the night. Slow down and allow plenty of time to reach your destination if driving. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of west central Wisconsin and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
